law.catch_line: Appointment of Secretary of State as attorney to receive legal process.
law.text: Any liability self-insurance group accepting a certificate of filing pursuant to this subtitle is deemed to have appointed the Secretary of State as its attorney to receive service of legal process issued against it in Kentucky. This appointment shall be irrevocable, shall bind any successor in interest, and shall remain in effect as long as there is in this state any professional or public liabilities.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 358, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994.
